document_notes.text:
This update for wireshark fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-11595: FiveCo RAP dissector infinite loop (bsc#1233594).
- CVE-2024-11596: ECMP dissector crash (bsc#1233593).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: FiveCo RAP dissector infinite loop in Wireshark 4.4.0 to 4.4.1 and 4.2.0 to 4.2.8 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
